meanings.sent1: I found a beautiful blewit in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The chef used blewits to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The blewit decided to join the other mushrooms for a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The blewit stood out among the other mushrooms like a purple jewel.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the blewit filled the kitchen with a delightful fragrance.

meanings.definition: To have made a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I blewit by forgetting to bring my homework to school.
meanings.sent2: She blewit by accidentally deleting her important files.
meanings.sent3: The magician blewit by pulling a rabbit out of his hat instead of a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent4: He blewit like a quarterback throwing the ball to the wrong team.
meanings.sent5: The detective blewit by accusing the wrong suspect of the crime.
